description: The island has already exceeded its target of 70% recycling by 2030.
title: Guernsey 'one of the highest' recycling rates in the world
title_page: Guernsey 'one of the highest' recycling rates in the world - BBC News
maintext: In total, 73% of household waste was recycled or composted last year - an increase from 50% in 2017, the last full year before changes were put in.
